data.eml:eml: A new Afrotropical Ogovea (Opiliones, Cyphophthalmi) from Cameroon, with a discussion on the taxonomic characters in the family Ogoveidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giribet, Gonzalo, Prieto, Carlos E. (2003): A new Afrotropical Ogovea (Opiliones, Cyphophthalmi) from Cameroon, with a discussion on the taxonomic characters in the family Ogoveidae. Zootaxa 329: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156214
